Articles.Content: I'm working on a weapons bay for BD armory, and I want to set it up so the bay opens when the radar is locked. I have the radar lock portion working, but I can't figure out how to make the control surface that we repurposed move to it's "deployed" down position. Does anyone know what the code looks like for control surfaces?

We're trying to call the toggle feature from the control surface module. The part could also use the IR module if that's easier for some reason.

Edited August 18, 2015 by clown_baby
I think I figured it out using the transform command. I'm going to mess with it tonight and I'll post here if I got it.
